Evaluation on 300W
Our method is able to achieve the state - of - the - art performance on the 300W testing dataset , see .

challenge subset ( iBug dataset ).from sentence:
For the challenge subset ( iBug dataset ) , we are able to outperform
Wing by a significant margin , which also proves the robustness of our approach against occlusion and large pose variation .

300 W private test dataset.from sentence: Furthermore , on the 300 W private test dataset ) , we again outperform the previous state - of - theart on variant metrics including NME , AUC and FR measured with either 8 % NME and 10 % NME .

Our method.from sentence:
Evaluation on WFLW
Our method again achieves the best results on the WFLW dataset in , which is significantly more difficult than COFW and 300W ( see for visualizations ) .

fails.from sentence: All in all , our approach fails on only 2.84 % of all images , more than a two times improvement compared with 7.6 .
